廗字的基本解释

廗
dài
屋檐下斜搭的帐棚。
席：“织柳为室，旃廗为盖。”

廗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xí］
同“席1”。
(1)席位，坐位。
(2)用芦苇、竹篾、草等编成平片的东西，用以铺炕、床或搭棚子等。

廗字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廗； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页350第06
【集韻】【韻會】?當蓋切，音帶。【玉篇】邪廗也。【集韻】屋邪。　又水名。【魏志·宕昌國傳】其地，自仇池以西，東西千里，廗水以南，南北八百里。

廗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
廗字的起名意思

暂无。

Wai
Basic explanation of words
Wai
dài
A tent set up diagonally under the eaves.
Xi: "Weaving the willows is the room, and 旃廗 is the cover."
Wai
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xí］
Same as "Seat 1".
(1) Seats, seats.
(2) Use reeds, bamboo strips, grass, etc. to make flat sheets for laying kangs, beds, or sheds.
Wai
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　廗; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 350 06
[Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Danggeqie, soundtrack. [Jade articles] Evil too. [Jiyun] House evil.　Also known as water. [Wei Zhi·Dangchang Kingdom Biography] The land is west of Qiuchi, thousands of miles from east to west, south of Aishui, and 800 miles from north to south.
